alert.note: Alert for La Paz; Yuma (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 17 at 7:44PM MST until August 17 at 8:30PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern La Paz County in west central Arizona... North central Yuma County in southwestern Arizona... * Until 830 PM MST. * At 744 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located 15 miles north of Yuma Proving Ground, or 24 miles north of Martinez Lake, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern La Paz and north central Yuma Counties. This includes AZ Route 95 between mile markers 68 and 86. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
